item.description:
There is another meetup at 4pm that is going to watch the tree lighting. I suggest we leave the bar by 345pm at the latest and meetup with them. 

I did this last year. You can get food, order a hot chocolate with a shot of peppermint schnopps. It's the bomb. Then we can hook up with the other group, watch the tree, and go back to the bar. It'll be a fun alcoholic Christmas except Dad won't pass out on the front lawn.

The Ames Plow Tavern is right next to where they light the tree, next to Ned Devines.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sitting at the bar
item.name: Peppermint Schnopps, Hot Chocolate & Tree Lighting
